md:
giải nghĩa từ "schoolwork" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Schoolwork** (noun)

* Meaning: Tasks or activities assigned to students by their teachers to be completed at school or at home.
* Vietnamese meaning: Công việc học tập, bài tập về nhà.

Example sentence: "I have a lot of schoolwork to do tonight, so I won't be able to watch TV."

* Related words: homework, assignment, project, study.

Note: "Schoolwork" can refer to any tasks or activities assigned to students, including homework, assignments, projects, and studying. It is a general term that encompasses a wide range of academic tasks.
